attributes.action: sort the local traffic issues surrounding the dartford river crossing
attributes.background: a daily occurrence due to incidents at the dartford river crossing, causing ttal gridlock on surrounding rounds in the Dartford Borough for hours on end. Causing local Resients to be late to and from work, missing vital hospital and doctor appointments

rejection.details:
If you would like a public inquiry into the performance of traffic-reducing measures at the Dartford Crossing, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167168
